title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-3.2 - Permit application requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-3.2 - Permit application requirements

State Regulations

These requirements apply to the owner of a land disposal
facility who is required by this Part to obtain a permit to construct and
operate a land disposal facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
383-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
